name: Liburan Sakura School Simulator Car Game
name_original: Liburan Sakura School Simulator Car Game
description:
Liburan Sakura School Simulator Car Game is a racing-platformer game developed by Octo 4. It was originally released in 2021.
Liburan Sakura School Simulator Car Game is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
